sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtncntcsystem ( INSTT_ID /* */ , SYS_ID /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , SYS_IP /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , USE_AT /* */ ) VALUES ( #insttId# /* */ , #sysId# /* */ , #sysNm# /* */ , #sysIp# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #useAt# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtncntcsystem SET INSTT_ID=#insttId# /* */ , SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */ , SYS_NM=#sysNm# /* */ , SYS_IP=#sysIp# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ WHERE INSTT_ID=#insttId# /* */ AND SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtncntcsystem WHERE INSTT_ID=#insttId# /* */ AND SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT INSTT_ID /* */ , SYS_ID /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , SYS_IP /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , USE_AT /* */ FROM comtncntcsystem WHERE INSTT_ID=#insttId# /* */ AND SYS_ID=#sysId# /* */

SELECT INSTT_ID /* */ , SYS_ID /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , SYS_IP /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , USE_AT /* */ FROM comtncntcsystem WHERE 1=1
INSTT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SYS_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY INSTT_ID DESC /* */ , SYS_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

INSTT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
